title: Emotet Variant #442 Analysis
summary: Unpacking the loader and identifying new C2 obfuscation techniques.
intro: Detailed static and dynamic analysis of a suspicious binary found in the finance department. The objective is to determine capabilities and IOCs.

steps.title: 01. Sample Acquisition
steps.content: The file was delivered via a phishing email disguised as an invoice. PE Studio indicates high entropy.
steps.code:
File Type: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386
Entropy: 7.821 (Packed)
Imports: KERNEL32.dll (suspiciously low)

steps.title: 02. Unpacking & Deobfuscation
steps.content: Loaded sample into x64dbg. Set breakpoints on VirtualAlloc. Upon execution, the malware allocated memory.
steps.code:
bp VirtualAlloc
run
# Wait for allocation
follow in dump

title: Windows Server Ransomware Artifacts
summary: Disk forensics breakdown identifying patient zero.
intro: Investigating a compromised server to find the entry point.

steps.title: 01. MFT Analysis
steps.content: Parsed the Master File Table to find creation timestamps of encrypted files.
